May 26 @ 6:00 pm
-
8:00 pm
FREE Memorial Concert & Picnic
Memorial Park
1620 Riverside Avenue, 					Jacksonville
Free concert Monday, May 26, 2025 | Starts at 6:00 PM Bring folding chairs and blankets.
December 14, 2024 @ 3:00 pm
-
6:00 pm
Recreate Memorial Park‚Äôs Opening Day Picture
Memorial Park
1620 Riverside Avenue, 					Jacksonville
Join us in celebrating 100 years of Memorial Park by recreating the opening day photograph. We'll have live music, food trucks and local vendors. Mark Krancer will take the picture at 4:00pm.
December 1, 2024 @ 9:30 am
-
10:30 am
Yoga in the Park
Memorial Park
1620 Riverside Avenue, 					Jacksonville
In partnership with Yoga Den Avondale, we would like to introduce our Yoga in the Park series! Start your Sunday morning off feeling energized with a flow style class, focusing on breath work and body awareness. Contact

Mailing address / correspondence

1650-302 #322 Margaret Street
Jacksonville, Florida 32204-3869
General inquiries

MEDIA inquiries
For media inquiries, please complete
this form
.
Weddings & Special Events
To reserve Memorial Park for an event, please contact the City of Jacksonville. Additional information can be found
here
.
Comments & Suggestions
If you have concerns or comments regarding Memorial Park or its users, or if you have ideas for ways to improve or enhance the park, please complete the form or send an email to
info@memparkjax.org
. If you observe anyone breaking the law or someone injured who needs immediate medical attention, please call 9-1-1 immediately. Otherwise, for non-emergencies, please contact us to report any act of violence or destruction of park property that you have observed.
Contact Us
We want to hear from you! Use the form below to subscribe to our newsletter, ask questions, volunteer, or to inform us about something in the park ‚Äî non-emergency only.
First Name *
(Required)
Last Name *
(Required)
Email Address *
(Required)
Message *
(Required)
CAPTCHA
Location & Directions
From the North
(e.g., Jacksonville International Airport)
Take I-95 South.
Take the exit for Forest Street.
Take a left onto Forest Street.
Take a right onto Riverside Avenue.
Memorial Park will be on your left.
From the East
(e.g., the Beaches)
Take Atlantic, Beach, or Butler Boulevards west.
Get onto I-95 North.
Follow the instructions above from the south of Jacksonville.
From the South
(e.g., St. Augustine)
Take I-95 North.
Take the exit for Park Street.
Take a left onto Park Street.
Take a left onto Margaret Street (at the flashing light of 5 Points).
Memorial Park will be on your left.
From the West
(e.g., Lake City)
Take I-10 East.
Take the exit for Stockton Street.
Take a left onto Stockton Street.
Take a left onto Riverside Avenue.
Memorial Park will be on your right.

Leadership
Photo courtesy of Mark Krancer
Photo Courtesy of Mark Krancer
Current Leadership
Board of Directors and Officers
Memorial Park Association is comprised of an all-volunteer board of directors, each elected by the board, who serve as
chairpersons
and members of various committees that oversee the preservation of the park in perpetuity, and officers elected from the board to serve on the Executive Committee to help the City of Jacksonville manage the park‚Äôs day-to-day operations and maintenance needs. Currently Memorial Park Association has no paid staff.

Patrick Emmet
